message: SYNAPSE-905: Changed the stock quote sample service so that it uses a single namespace again. Also fixed the samples to be compatible with the changed service and to produce messages that conform to the schema. This change corresponds to solution (2) in the issue description.

This sample is an introduction to Synapse Scatter-Gather eip function template. Scatter-Gather pattern broadcasts a message to multiple recipients and re-aggregates the responses back into a single message and send back to client or mediates to the defined target sequence.
